clause_text: 1.50 to 2.00 m depth. Terrace water shall be channeled to pits or trenches. Such pits or trenches shall be back filled with filter media comprising the following materials. 40 mm stone aggregate as bottom layer up to 50% of the depth; 20 mm stone aggregate as lower middle layer up to 20% of the depth; Coarse sand as upper middle layer up to 20% of the depth;

source_pdf.text_snippet: 1.50 to 2.00 m depth. Terrace water shall be channeled to pits or trenches. Such pits or trenches shall be back filled with filter media comprising the following materials.
